title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

message-id.title: The message-id schema
message-id.description: This is a unique identifier of each message.

message.title: The message schema
message.description: This identifies that this section contains response message items.

shipments_id.title: The shipments_id schema
shipments_id.description: This is a system generated id to make shipments unique.

ship_row_version.title: The ship_row_version schema
ship_row_version.description: This is a system generated number that is used to control updates to the record.

organizations_id.title: The organizations_id schema
organizations_id.description: This is a system generated id that is used to restrict access to customers data.

client_company_id.title: The client_company_id schema
client_company_id.description: This is a system generated id that is used identify a customer.

client_company_name.title: The client_company_name schema
client_company_name.description: This is the name the customer uses to identify itself to the public.

suppliers_id.title: The suppliers_id schema
suppliers_id.description: This is a system generated id that is used identify a company supplier.

supplier_name.title: The supplier_name schema
supplier_name.description: The name that is used by the supplier.

shipment_status.title: The shipment_status schema
shipment_status.description: This is the current state of the shipment.

bill_of_lading.title: The bill_of_lading schema
bill_of_lading.description: This is an externally provided value for identification of the shipment.

port_of_entry.title: The port_of_entry schema
port_of_entry.description: This is the name of the port that the goods will enter.

port_of_origin.title: The port_of_origin schema
port_of_origin.description: This is the name of the port that the goods left.

country_of_destination.title: The country_of_destination schema
country_of_destination.description: This is the name of the country where the goods will be delivered.

shipment_poe_eta.title: The shipment_poe_eta schema
shipment_poe_eta.description: Approximately when the cargo will arrive at the port of entry.

consignment_weight.title: The consignment_weight schema
consignment_weight.description: This is the total gross weight for the shipment, including the product and packaging.

consignment_weight_unit_of_measure.title: The consignment_weight_unit_of_measure schema
consignment_weight_unit_of_measure.description: What measurement is used for the weight supplied.

created_by_date.title: The created_by_date schema
created_by_date.description: When the user entry was entered in the system.

created_by_requestor_username.title: The created_by_requestor_username schema
created_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users creation.

updated_by_date.title: The updated_by_date schema
updated_by_date.description: When the user entry was last updated in the system.

updated_by_requestor_username.title: The updated_by_requestor_username schema
updated_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users update.

through_bill_of_lading.title: The through_bill_of_lading schema
through_bill_of_lading.description: The external identifier for paper working covering empty containers.

shipment_history.title: The shipment_history schema
shipment_history.description: This identifies that this section contains shipment history items

shipment_poe_eta.title: The shipment_poe_eta schema
shipment_poe_eta.description: Approximately when the cargo will arrive at the port of entry.

created_by_date.title: The created_by_date schema
created_by_date.description: When the user entry was entered in the system.

shipment_statuses_history.title: The shipment_statuses_history schema
shipment_statuses_history.description: This identifies that this section contains shipment statuses history items.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Instance of a shipment statuses history.

shipmentstatushistory_id.title: The shipmentstatushistory_id schema
shipmentstatushistory_id.description: This is a system generated id to make shipment status history unique.

historic_status.title: The historic_status schema
historic_status.description: The status at the time this record was created.

cognito_username.title: The cognito_username schema
cognito_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who created the shipment record.

status_set_timestamp.title: The status_set_timestamp schema
status_set_timestamp.description: This is when the record was created.

containers.title: The containers schema
containers.description: This identifies that this section contains shipment containers items.

containers_id.title: The containers_id schema
containers_id.description: This is a system generated id for a container assigned to a container.

container_row_version.title: The container_row_version schema
container_row_version.description: This is a system generated number that is used to control updates to the record.

container_tag.title: The container_tag schema
container_tag.description: The external identifier used to identify the container.

container_form_factor.title: The container_form_factor schema
container_form_factor.description: The length of the container in feet.

trips_id.title: The trips_id schema
trips_id.description: This is the system generated id that identifies the trip.

container_cargo_gross_weight.title: The container_cargo_gross_weight schema
container_cargo_gross_weight.description: The gross weight per container, NOT including the container weight (tare).

container_cargo_gross_unit_of_measure.title: The container_cargo_gross_unit_of_measure schema
container_cargo_gross_unit_of_measure.description: What measurement is used for the weight supplied.

created_by_date.title: The created_by_date schema
created_by_date.description: When the user entry was entered in the system.

created_by_requestor_username.title: The created_by_requestor_username schema
created_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users creation.

updated_by_date.title: The updated_by_date schema
updated_by_date.description: When the user entry was last updated in the system.

updated_by_requestor_username.title: The updated_by_requestor_username schema
updated_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users update.

cargo.title: The cargo schema
cargo.description: This identifies that this section contains shipment container cargo items

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An nstance of shipment container cargo.

cargo_id.title: The cargo_id schema
cargo_id.description: This is a system generated id for cargo being shipped.

cargo_row_version.title: The cargo_row_version schema
cargo_row_version.description: This is a system generated number that is used to control updates to the record.

cargo_type.title: The cargo_type schema
cargo_type.description: A general name of what good or product is being conveyed.

cargo_gross_weight.title: The cargo_gross_weight schema
cargo_gross_weight.description: The gross weight of the cargo.

cargo_gross_unit_of_measure.title: The cargo_gross_unit_of_measure schema
cargo_gross_unit_of_measure.description: What measurement is used for the weight supplied.

cargo_quantity_unit_of_measure.title: The cargo_quantity_unit_of_measure schema
cargo_quantity_unit_of_measure.description: What measurement is used for the quantity supplied.

created_by_date.description: When the user entry was entered in the system.

created_by_requestor_username.title: The created_by_requestor_username schema
created_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users creation.

updated_by_date.description: When the user entry was last updated in the system.

updated_by_requestor_username.title: The updated_by_requestor_username schema
updated_by_requestor_username.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the users update.

cargo_parent_type.title: The cargo_parent_type schema
cargo_parent_type.description: Who is the parent of this cargo, shipment or container.
